tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE research_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), researcher VARCHAR(255), date DATE, description TEXT)

CREATE TABLE collaborators (
    collaborator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collaborator_name VARCHAR(255),
    institution_name VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(100),
    research_data_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (research_data_id) REFERENCES research_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    researcher_id INT,
    date_created DATE
)

CREATE TABLE collaborators (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    organization VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE stakeholders (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE research_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    researcher_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research_publications (
    publication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id UUID REFERENCES research_projects(project_id),
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    author TEXT NOT NULL,
    publication_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE research_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id UUID REFERENCES research_projects(project_id),
    data_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    data_description TEXT,
    data_file BYTEA NOT NULL
);
